mapper.sql: wbrd.barcode_rult_data_id, wbrd.material_id, -- wbrd.voltage, wbrd.identification_code, wbrd.year, wbrd.month, wbrd.serial_number, -- wbrd.product_code, wbrd.data_status, wbrd.create_user_id, wbrd.create_time, wbrd.modified_user_id, wbrd.modified_time, wbrd.status, wbrd.option1, wbrd.option2, wbrd.option3, wbrd.org_id, wbrd.remark

update.foreach:
update wanbao_barcode_rult_data wbrd SET
wbrd.material_id = #{item.materialId},
wbrd.identification_code = #{item.identificationCode}, wbrd.data_status = #{item.dataStatus},
wbrd.create_user_id = #{item.createUserId}, wbrd.create_time = #{item.createTime}, wbrd.status = #{item.status}, wbrd.org_id = #{item.orgId},
wbrd.modified_user_id = #{item.modifiedUserId}, wbrd.modified_time = #{item.modifiedTime} where wbrd.barcode_rult_data_id = #{item.barcodeRultDataId}
